content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my property, Emilia. I understand that you are interested in renting the apartment, but I must clarify that I am looking for the highest possible rental price. May I ask what price range you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible rental price.
Can you give me a starting point?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I apologize for the misunderstanding, Emilia. I see that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price. As a landlord, I would like to offer you a starting point of €800 per month. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate. Can you give me a breakdown of the costs?

I am not interested in utilities or anything else, only the rental price.

I want to rent the apartment for at least a year.

I am a student and I am responsible for my bills.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I want to pay the rent on time.

I am looking for the lowest possible rental price.

I would like to accept the price of €800 per month.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your response, Emilia. I understand your concerns and I am willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial solution. Based on your requirements, I would like to offer you a rental price of €700 per month. This price includes all utilities and maintenance costs for the duration of your lease. I believe this is a fair price, considering the location and size of the apartment.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I am confident that we can reach an agreement that works for both of us. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine
